name: Instant Pot Spaghetti
description: Instant Pot Spaghetti - this easy yet delicious family friendly recipe takes less than 10 minutes to prep for, and cooks in the Instant Pot in just 9 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Press the saute button on the Instant Pot. When hot, add the olive oil, onion and garlic. Cook, stirring, for about 3 minutes until the onion in translucent. Now add the salt and cooked lentils. Stir, then turn off the saute.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the saute button on the Instant Pot. When hot, add the olive oil, onion and garlic. Cook, stirring, for about 3 minutes until the onion in translucent. Now add the salt and cooked lentils. Stir, then turn off the saute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the water in and using a spatula, de-glaze the bottom of the pan to get any stuck bits off the bottom (this helps to avoid the "burn" message.) Add the spaghetti noodles, broken in half. Then pour the marinara on top of the noodles, and push the noodles into the liquid to cover. Don't stir.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the water in and using a spatula, de-glaze the bottom of the pan to get any stuck bits off the bottom (this helps to avoid the "burn" message.) Add the spaghetti noodles, broken in half. Then pour the marinara on top of the noodles, and push the noodles into the liquid to cover. Don't stir.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lid on, seal and set to high pressure for 9 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the lid on, seal and set to high pressure for 9 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Do a quick release so the pasta won't overcook. Stir everything together, then serve with vegan parmesan and bread if desired!
recipeInstructions.name: Do a quick release so the pasta won't overcook. Stir everything together, then serve with vegan parmesan and bread if desired!
